text: 17.3 Luk 24.26, Apo 3.18, 9.22, 18.28, Gal 3.1 Anɨgɨl ag amɨl apɨl gɨlɨg, kɨlop God takaw tep ak agñɨtep gɨlɨg agak, Bɨ God nop aglup ak ne apɨl, chɨnop nen agɨl yul dak agak. God takaw ned agɨl tɨkɨlak ak, nop agɨl tɨkɨlak tek, kumɨl tepayaŋ tɨkjakak agak. Bɨ God nop aglup ak, binɨb okok kɨlop dɨl kod yenɨgab ak nɨm, bɨ Jisas nɨbop kesɨm debin ak nep agak.
